title: Advice?!! Please let me know what you think...
content:
Hi all, I am trying to use illustrator (as a beginner) and I need to describe the word Poulets Rotis (french for chicken rotisserie).

Here is what I have done so far but Im not sure if antother font than Mesquite would suit it better and any advice on rotating my letters? (am using illustrator v10).

Any advice would be great!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011063923im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/poulets_5006.gif)

 [‹ Spanish language question](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011063923/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44975 "Go to previous forum topic") [Know any good legibility tests for typefaces? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011063923/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41365 "Go to next forum topic")
author: _woonik_

comments.content:

Best interpretation of the concept I’ve seen, so far.
